import sys

t = int(sys.stdin.readline())

for a in range(t):
    dic = {}
    suma = 0
    nrvot = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    for b in range(nrvot):
        nume,pm = sys.stdin.readline().split()
        dic[nume]=pm
    for b in dic:
        if dic[b]=="+":
            suma+=1
        else:
            suma-=1
    print suma
